title: Questions about Bans
body:
If a player was temporarily banned in season 5 for boosting, will the next offense be a permanent ban? 

Is the outcome the same no matter what wrongdoing the player does? 


Thank you.

replies.body: if hes boosting again most likely. if it is for a different offense i think you go through the normal stages, but this is just what i think nothing confirmed

This is what I figured. 

However, I was wondering if a specific amount of time has passed, will a player's offenses possibly be forgiven.

A drop in punishment tier occurs for toxicity bans to my knowledge
A boosting punishment is usually perma ban
dont think boosting offenses will be forgiven at any time. its not something you can do out of a effect like flame its something you have to plan and if you do that a 2nd time its over

You will not have your rewards stripped next season, but if you are ever caught for boosting again it will be perma. At least that is what I remember from the last discussion I saw about it, if I am wrong someone can correct me.
